ai.title: Turn any idea into a
ai.subtitle: With the help of AI and our creative team, you can transform almost anything into a physical gift. Share a picture, a child’s drawing, or even a short description — and we’ll bring it to life as a figurine, puzzle, sleep light, or other custom creation. Your imagination becomes a gift they can hold.

upload.title: Upload & Share
upload.text: Upload your photo, drawing, or idea. Our AI gets to work instantly and starts shaping it into a gift.

design.title: Design & Refine
design.text: Some models are created fully by AI — you can interact directly, adjust, and confirm in real time. Others combine AI with our design team. In those cases, you’ll see the preview once it’s finalized, and you can approve or request changes.

print.title: Print & Deliver
print.text: Once you confirm the design, we 3D print it in the Netherlands with high-quality materials and ship it straight to your door.
